name: Feminize Me!
storyline: A depressed office worker dreams of a different life... possibly even a different body! Will you help them achieve it?
summary:
Feminize Me! is an adult transformation puzzle game. Funded via Patreon and inspired by EYEZMAZE's GROW games, it tasks the player with figuring out the correct combination to complete the protagonist's transformation into a woman.

The game features 4 endings, 40320 possible combinations, a hint system and a special unlockable mode.
